Question 1.data: How do I know my donations are going to the right place?

Question 1 Answer.data: Rivers of Goodness Organization evaluate all the needy locations and sends video and picture reports to the doners as needed to evaluate the need of different villages.

Question 2.data: How can I know that the donations were done correctly?

Question 2 Answer.data: First a receipt is sent automatically to the doner’s email address confirming that the organization has received the donations. Second, a follow up from one of the administration staff will be done via WhatsApp message or email to show the videos and pictures of the project that was accomplished. We ask that our doners follow up with us through the contact us form or via WhatsApp in case their project is not shared with them.

Question 3.data: Why is the organization’s work focused in Africa?

Question 3 Answer.data: We believe that Africa is an amazing and rich continent that was mistreated by the rest of the world for the last two centuries. The organization focuses on the investment in education to allow for the self-development of the African countries. In addition, we provide the basic needs (food, water, and medical services) to the needy families in different regions in Africa.

Question 4.data: I have money and I do not know which program to donate in?

Question 4 Answer.data: In this case, we advise that you donate in the “Most needed” category, which will be decided by the organization’s administration to the program that requires funding the most at that specific time.

Question 5.data: Which one of the programs is Zakat eligible?

Question 5 Answer.data: All our programs are Zakat eligible, primarily because we work with poor and needy families. We also work with recent reverts to Islam that our work gets their hearts closer to the religion. Scholars have confirmed that all our programs are Zakat eligible, including building masjids and digging water wells

Question 6.data: If I registered as a volunteer, do I have to travel to Africa?

Question 6 Answer.data: It depends, there might be a need to travel for volunteer work. In this case, you will be contacted ahead of time to plan your travel. In case you would like to volunteer in a different way (without traveling), please indicate that in the volunteer form.

Question 7.data: If I decided to travel with Rivers of Goodness as a volunteer, is it safe to stay in Malawi?

Question 7 Answer.data: Yes, Malawi is a 100% safe country, and in case of travel with us, the organization will be preparing a place for the volunteers and will help in attaining the travel visas, the visa and travel ticket costs shall be covered by the volunteer.

Question 1.data: إذا قررت السفر مع مؤسسة أنهار الخير كمتطوع، فهل من الآمن البقاء في ملاوي لمدة التطوع؟

Question 1 Answer.data: نعم، تضمن المؤسسة توفير أماكن إقامة آمنة ودعم محلي للمتطوعين أثناء إقامتهم.

Question 2.data: إذا قمت بالتسجيل كمتطوع، فهل يجب علي السفر إلى إفريقيا؟

Question 2 Answer.data: لا، فرص التطوع متاحة عن بعد وفي الموقع.

Question 3.data: أي من مشاريع المؤسسة الخيرية يجوز دفع الزكاة فيها؟

Question 3 Answer.data: Projects related to poverty alleviation, education, and emergency relief are eligible for Zakat.

Question 4.data: لماذا يتركز عمل المؤسسة في إفريقيا؟

Question 4 Answer.data: المشاريع المتعلقة بالتخفيف من حدة الفقر والتعليم والإغاثة في حالات الطوارئ مؤهلة للحصول على الزكاة.

Question 5.data: لدي مال و لا أعرف في أي مشروع تبرع أنفق عليه؟

Question 5 Answer.data: You can explore our various projects and choose one based on your interests and impact goals.

Question 6.data: ما هي الخطوات التي تضمن سلامة إستلام أموال التبرع؟

Question 6 Answer.data: يمكنك استكشاف مشاريعنا المتنوعة واختيار المشروع المناسب لاهتماماتك وأهدافك.

Question 7.data: كيف أعلم أن التبرعات تصل إلى الأماكن الصحيحة؟

Question 7 Answer.data: توفر مؤسستنا التحديثات والتقارير والشهادات من المستفيدين.
